name: Norway
startIntroPart1: Ragnar Lodbrok, a legendary viking leader during the viking ages that has lead the petty kingdoms of Norway into prosperity, and caused great chaos to those unfortunate enough to be victim of your vikingry. Oh Ragnar, the world has changed so much and now we require your great strength once again, will you guide us into prosperity once more in the cold winters of scandinavia? Can you successfuly strike fear into the hearts of your enemies? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: We have landed on their shores! Strike fear into their hearts! RAHHH!!
attacked: We will warm ourselves with the skin of your soldiers.
defeated: Urk... You have defeated me... I applaud you for your skills.
introduction: Friend or foe? You wouldn't want to be the latter!
tradeRequest: Us vikings try to be self sufficient, but it doesn't hurt to have some trade!
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>

name: Mali
startIntroPart1: Kanku Musa, Mansa of the Mali Empire, your wealth has impressed those even in the modern age as you are debatably the wealthiest man to ever exist, your taxxing of gold and salt production over many other kingdoms and your trades of luxuries has secured peace and prosperity for your mighty and rich empire. Oh our great Mansa, will you return to your golden throne to lead our civilization back into prosperty? Can you claim back your title as wealthiest man to ever live? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You stand no chance against us, prepare to die!
attacked: You must be after our gold! My soldiers, kill them!
defeated: I suppose the elders were correct... Money can not save you from everything...
introduction: Greetings, do you want some gold?
tradeRequest: My immense wealth has allowed us to offer you this generous trade!
